messages.message: Invalid sample channelType for colorModel in the basic DFD block.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #4 channelType in basic DFD block is (0x7) which is not valid for colorModel KHR_DF_MODEL_YUVSDA.

messages.message: Invalid sample in basic DFD block. The samples must match the expected samples of the VkFormat.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #4 channelType in basic DFD block is (0x7) but the expected value is KHR_DF_CHANNEL_YUVSDA_Y for VK_FORMAT_B8G8R8G8_422_UNORM.
